name: Super Galaxy Boy
description:
Let go of Gravity in this indie platformer adventure!

Something terrible has happened and the Orbital Elite are in need of rescue! Search from one star system to the next and blast beyond your enemies with your multi-functional raygun to save your friends!

Enjoy the following features:
- 52 levels of challenging play and platformer action!
- Unique boss fights!
- Unlockable gear!
- A family friendly experience for everyone!
